en.name: Core Competencies
en.description:
• Legacy systems documentation & knowledge extraction
• Reverse engineering (code, database, interfaces)
• Architecture support: ERD, data dictionaries, BPM, integration maps
• Modernization roadmaps: legacy-to-cloud, platform upgrades
• Data migration/ETL, validation, and reconciliation
• AI-accelerated analysis: Copilot-assisted coding, MCP workflows
• DevOps: Git, Azure DevOps, CI/CD, issue tracking
• Security, quality assurance, and production support best practices

en.name: Technical Stack
en.description:
• Languages: C#, Java, Python, PowerShell, SQL, PL/SQL, TypeScript, JavaScript
• Frameworks/Platforms: .NET 6/8, Angular, PowerBuilder, Informix 4GL/Genero
• Databases: SQL Server, Oracle, Informix
• Cloud & DevOps: Azure, Docker, Kubernetes (exploration), Terraform (scripts), CI/CD
• Power Platform: PowerApps, PowerAutomate, Power BI, Power Pages
• Tools: Jira, Confluence, SSRS, SAP BusinessObjects, Bizagi, PowerDesigner

en.name: Website Frontend Development (MVC Asp.Net C# / Angular / Power Pages / Iron Speed Designer)
en.description: Modern frontend development using popular frameworks for building interactive user interfaces connected to SQL Server Databases.

en.name: PowerBuilder
en.description: Expert-level proficiency in developing and maintening applications.

en.name: Informix 4gl / Fourgen Case Tools / Genero
en.description: Developing and maintaining applications in Informix 4gl connected to either Informix, Sql Server, and Oracle

en.name: Informix, Oracle, and SQL Server Databases
en.description: Database design, development, maintenance, and optimizations.

en.name: BI Reporting
en.description: SSRS, SAP Business Objects, Power BI report development and maintenance.

fr.name: Compétences clés

• Documentation des systèmes hérités et extraction des connaissances

• DevOps : Git, Azure DevOps, CI/CD, suivi des problèmes
• Sécurité, assurance qualité et meilleures pratiques de support en production

es.name: Competencias clave
es.description:
• Documentación de sistemas heredados y extracción de conocimiento
• Ingeniería inversa (código, base de datos, interfaces)
• Soporte de arquitectura: DER, diccionarios de datos, BPM, mapas de integración
• Hojas de ruta de modernización: migración a la nube, actualizaciones de plataforma
• Migración/ETL de datos, validación y conciliación
• Análisis acelerado por IA: codificación asistida por Copilot, flujos de trabajo MCP
• DevOps: Git, Azure DevOps, CI/CD, seguimiento de incidencias
• Seguridad, aseguramiento de la calidad y mejores prácticas de soporte en producción
